评论详情: Great sunglasses for the price! Couldn't be happier with them.
This glasses are great appearance wise, however, my pair is uneven and sit lopsided on my face out of the box.
The glasses arrived quicker than expected and were packaged very securely. For the price, they are surprisingly good quality. They look great and fit perfectly.
Son unos lentes de muy buena calidad, los materiales, el estuche, todo en general Muy bonitas!!
Excelente producto me gusto mucho, las gafas llegaron tal cual  como aparecía en las imágenes y llegaron muy cumplidas

评论概述: Very well made and presented professionally
评论详情: This doesn't look or feel like low cost sunglasses.  Not only the box and other accessories are well made and presented but also the glasses itself looks and feels like a sunglasses with much higher cost.  The lens is bit small for my face and the frame is bit too tight on my temples, but I have to give this 5 stars.  Good sunglasses
These men's sunglasses are stylish and comfortable. They offer great UV protection, and the fit is just right. The frames feel sturdy, and they look even better in person. Perfect for everyday wear!

评论概述: Excellent customer service…Perfect for bright sunny days !
评论详情: Customer service is the best! I now have a pair that looks great and fits perfect. Thank you!

评论概述: Wonderful high end sunglasses that are affordable!
评论详情: These sunglasses are super well made and are thick and durable while remaining lightweight and attractive. This is a dark set of lenses and it is perfect for blinding sunlight at the beach. I wore these the whole week we were at the beach, and I can say that they do not scratch easily and are one of the most comfortable to wear pair of sunglasses I have ever owned. They come in a nice case that I do not really use, but it is well made in it's own right.

These shades are sweet! I’m VERY picky with sunglasses. Not so much brand names, but quality. These plastic shades have some weight to them and are polarized. They fit my face perfectly and have a classic retro look. They are also accompanied with a decent lined snap case and a cleaning cloth. They arrived in a very professional looking box as well. The all around presentation is A+
Amazing bargain - These are sturdy and come with great polarised lenses. I'll definitely shop with Carfia again
Nice frame, provides excellent UV protection, light and flexible frame and looks great - comes with a very nice case.

评论概述: these are sharp as all heck and I like em
评论详情: I'm a sucker for this style of glasses (retro, almost like clubmaster style).  These surprised me though as they are REALLY well made, with good materials and construction.  Great optics, and great appearance I now wear these daily.  Love the design (makes me look like Leo or the lead singer from Depeche :)  No really....t hey are that sharp!

A really nice pair of sunglasses. They fit well and have a great look. They wear well out in the sun and make it comfortable walking in full daylight. They come in a nice box and with a really good glasses case.  I’m very happy with these sunglasses.

Of course, when reviewing (and judging) items that might be considered 'fashion' related, much, or perhaps most, of the review is very subjective.  With that in mind, I can say that I love these sunglasses!As mentioned in the title of the product description, these would be considered a 'retro' shape AND, what is ideal for me is that they are a bit smaller than most of the sunglasses offered on Amazon.  This is where the subjectivity comes in...I have a smaller face, so large sunglasses do not look good on me.  In fact, sometimes, a 'child's frame' actually looks better on me than any adult sunglass frame.  These CARFIA sunglasses arrived in a classy box, a nice case, and were well protected with plastic sleeves on the temples and encased in a plastic bag. Also included is a microfibre cleaning cloth and card for assessing the polarization protection.  The frames are good looking and they are solid.  The hinges are also sturdy.  These sunglasses rival the pair of Maui Jim's that I own.  So again, the smaller shape of these, the great sun protection and the sturdiness of the glasses all create a tremendous pair of sunglasses.VERY Recommended!!!!

评论概述: Cool retro style with decent lenses
评论详情: I needed a new pair of sunglasses to keep in my car and wanted to try this pair as I really liked the retro design. A few comments: * The glasses look like the design shown on the website. * The glasses are slightly smaller (in diameter) than my more traditional aviator glasses but provided good sun coverage * The glasses are comfortable (even after a few hours on in the car) even though the frame doesn’t have any soft touch or silicon parts (for the nose or earpieces) * The lens are decent quality (especially for glasses of this price) and seemed free of distortion or any visual artifacts Overall, a decent pair of glasses with a very cool retro style.

The sunglasses are made very well. They look super cool and they come in very nice packaging from the sunglass case to the box that the case comes in. My only wish is that they were slightly bigger, otherwise I am satisfied.

评论概述: not bad sunglasses, but not my style
评论详情: unfortunately, these were listed without a picture, but i figured i'd risk it, as i usually love round sunglasses. these, however, are only really roundish, and at the lenses, less so at the frames, with a near cateye style frame. definitely not what i would call a masculine style, personally.
These sunglasses frames are made better than some of my prescription glasses. These sunglasses are clear and crisp. This is an outstanding pair of sunglasses for the price.

评论概述: REALLY cool and well made sunglasses
评论详情: Wow! I was really surprised by these sunglasses--especially for the price. They come beautifully packaged (& in that way could make a really nice gift). The frames are solid and smooth and seem very high end. (By way of example, I typically wear expensive sunglasses but wanted a pair that I could knock around and not need to be so careful with and these are actually just as nicely made as my Maui Jims and Pradas). The style is very cool, the polarization is very good for the price and they are solid enough that you could easily take them to the beach or on a boat without having to be too careful with them. Totally recommend these!
